description: Map Ref: 012H12Beautiful scenic trail with lots of photo-ops in Norris Point, Gros Morne National Park. Perfectly suited for a leisurely evening or morning stroll.
directions: Trailhead is about 100 m to the left (east) of Memorial University's Marine Biology Station and from the public wharf. Stairs lead up the hill and the trail takes you on a 360 degree loop on top of the hill with several picnic areas and view-points.
title: Burnt Hill
